channel.title: Posts on My New Hugo Site
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on My New Hugo Site

item.title: Hello World!
item.description:
Writing a blog is not something I have done before, but I will try to keep up with it this year, as a new years resolution. The content will likely be focused on tech but occasionally on other stuff as well.

The blog is created with Hugo and hosted on GitHub spaces. A combination which makes it easy to own your content in case of self-hosting or migrating content elsewhere.
